What is Verus Fee Pooling technology, and how does it address concerns about blockchain security?

Verus Fee Pooling technology is a sustainable mining and staking fee and revenue model that strengthens blockchain security. It preserves the immediate incentive to maximize per-block fees while smoothing fee distribution to miners and stakers over time. In this model, all fees from transactions in a block are gathered and added to a common, persistent pool of collected fees. The current block miner or staker takes up to 1% of the aggregate fee pool. This approach addresses concerns about blockchain security and fee distribution, as raised by Vitalik Buterin.
